languages.text: "Что? Почему так.. блекло?" {n}Леди Кассия удивленно моргает, очнувшись от наваждения и продолжая потирать место, куда врос камень. Алые глаза осторожно осматривают комнату, затем вас.{/n} "Что вы со мной сделали? Я... Я почти не вижу цвета! И ваш цвет... размыт. Кто вы?"

traits.locale_text: "Что? Почему так.. блекло?" {n}Леди Кассия удивленно моргает, очнувшись от наваждения и продолжая потирать место, куда врос камень. Алые глаза осторожно осматривают комнату, затем вас.{/n} "Что вы со мной сделали? Я... Я почти не вижу цвета! И ваш цвет... размыт. Кто вы?"

languages.text: "What? Why is everything so... dull?" {n}Lady Cassia blinks, waking from a vision and continuing to rub at the place where the stone was set. Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"
languages.original_text: "Что? Почему так.. блекло?" {n}Леди Кассия удивленно моргает, очнувшись от наваждения и продолжая потирать место, куда врос камень. Алые глаза осторожно осматривают комнату, затем вас.{/n} "Что вы со мной сделали? Я... Я почти не вижу цвета! И ваш цвет... размыт. Кто вы?"

Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

"What? Why is everything so... dull?" {n}Lady Cassia blinks, waking from a vision and continuing to rub at the place where the stone was set. Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

languages.text: “怎么回事？为什么一切都这么……黯淡？”{n}卡西娅女士眨了眨眼，从幻景中清醒过来，双手依然搓着刚刚石头嵌入的地方。她鲜红色的双眼谨慎地环视着房间，之后看着你。{/n}“你对我做了什么？我……我几乎看不到那些颜色了！还有你的颜色……它黯淡无光。你是什么人？”
languages.original_text: "What? Why is everything so... dull?" {n}Lady Cassia blinks, waking from a vision and continuing to rub at the place where the stone was set. Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

traits.locale_text: “怎么回事？为什么一切都这么……黯淡？”{n}卡西娅女士眨了眨眼，从幻景中清醒过来，双手依然搓着刚刚石头嵌入的地方。她鲜红色的双眼谨慎地环视着房间，之后看着你。{/n}“你对我做了什么？我……我几乎看不到那些颜色了！还有你的颜色……它黯淡无光。你是什么人？”

languages.text: «¿Qué? ¿Por qué está todo tan... apagado?». {n}Lady Cassia parpadea, despertando de su visión y tocando aún el lugar donde estaba la piedra. Sus ojos escarlata escudriñan la sala con atención, y después se centran en ti.{/n} «¿Qué me ha hecho?... ¡Apenas puedo ver los colores! Y su color... está apagado. ¿Quién es usted?».
languages.original_text: "What? Why is everything so... dull?" {n}Lady Cassia blinks, waking from a vision and continuing to rub at the place where the stone was set. Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? ¿Por qué está todo tan... apagado?». {n}Lady Cassia parpadea, despertando de su visión y tocando aún el lugar donde estaba la piedra. Sus ojos escarlata escudriñan la sala con atención, y después se centran en ti.{/n} «¿Qué me ha hecho?... ¡Apenas puedo ver los colores! Y su color... está apagado. ¿Quién es usted?».

languages.text: 「え？どうしてこんなに何もかもが…鈍いのです？」{n}レディ・カシアはまばたきをしてビジョンから覚め、石が置かれていた場所をこすり続けている。彼女の緋色の目は慎重に部屋を見回し、そしてあなたを見る。{/n}「私に何をしたのです？これは…色がほとんど見えない！あなたの色が…薄まっています。何者なのですか？」
languages.original_text: "What? Why is everything so... dull?" {n}Lady Cassia blinks, waking from a vision and continuing to rub at the place where the stone was set. Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

traits.locale_text: 「え？どうしてこんなに何もかもが…鈍いのです？」{n}レディ・カシアはまばたきをしてビジョンから覚め、石が置かれていた場所をこすり続けている。彼女の緋色の目は慎重に部屋を見回し、そしてあなたを見る。{/n}「私に何をしたのです？これは…色がほとんど見えない！あなたの色が…薄まっています。何者なのですか？」

languages.text: "Was? Warum ist alles so ... blass?" {n}Lady Cassia blinzelt, erwacht aus einer Vision und reibt sich weiterhin die Stelle, an welcher der Stein saß. Ihre scharlachroten Augen blicken sich vorsichtig in dem Raum um und suchen dann dich.{/n} "Was habt Ihr mir angetan? Ich ... ich kann die Farben kaum sehen! Und Eure Farbe ... ist gedämpft. Wer seid Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "What? Why is everything so... dull?" {n}Lady Cassia blinks, waking from a vision and continuing to rub at the place where the stone was set. Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

traits.locale_text: "Was? Warum ist alles so ... blass?" {n}Lady Cassia blinzelt, erwacht aus einer Vision und reibt sich weiterhin die Stelle, an welcher der Stein saß. Ihre scharlachroten Augen blicken sich vorsichtig in dem Raum um und suchen dann dich.{/n} "Was habt Ihr mir angetan? Ich ... ich kann die Farben kaum sehen! Und Eure Farbe ... ist gedämpft. Wer seid Ihr?"

languages.text: « Que se passe-t-il ? Pourquoi tout est si... terne ? » {n}Dame Cassia cligne des yeux comme si elle se libérait d'une vision, en continuant à frotter l'endroit où la pierre s'est insérée. Ses yeux écarlates parcourent la pièce d'un air méfiant, puis se posent sur vous.{/n} « Que m'avez-vous fait ? Je... C'est à peine si je vois les couleurs ! Et la vôtre... est sourde. Qui êtes-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "What? Why is everything so... dull?" {n}Lady Cassia blinks, waking from a vision and continuing to rub at the place where the stone was set. Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

traits.locale_text: « Que se passe-t-il ? Pourquoi tout est si... terne ? » {n}Dame Cassia cligne des yeux comme si elle se libérait d'une vision, en continuant à frotter l'endroit où la pierre s'est insérée. Ses yeux écarlates parcourent la pièce d'un air méfiant, puis se posent sur vous.{/n} « Que m'avez-vous fait ? Je... C'est à peine si je vois les couleurs ! Et la vôtre... est sourde. Qui êtes-vous ? »

languages.text: "Ne? Her şey neden bu kadar... Mat?" {n}Leydi Cassia, gözlerini kırpıştırıyor. İçinde bulunduğu düşten uyanıyor ve taşın olduğu yeri ovalamayı sürdürüyor. Kızıl gözleri, dikkatli bir şekilde odada geziyor, ardından sana odaklanıyor.{/n} "N'aptın bana? Renkleri neredeyse hiç göremiyorum. Senin rengin ise... Boğuk. Kimsin sen?"
languages.original_text: "What? Why is everything so... dull?" {n}Lady Cassia blinks, waking from a vision and continuing to rub at the place where the stone was set. Her scarlet eyes look cautiously around the room, then at you.{/n} "What did you do to me? I... I can barely see the colours! And your colour... it is muted. Who are you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Her şey neden bu kadar... Mat?" {n}Leydi Cassia, gözlerini kırpıştırıyor. İçinde bulunduğu düşten uyanıyor ve taşın olduğu yeri ovalamayı sürdürüyor. Kızıl gözleri, dikkatli bir şekilde odada geziyor, ardından sana odaklanıyor.{/n} "N'aptın bana? Renkleri neredeyse hiç göremiyorum. Senin rengin ise... Boğuk. Kimsin sen?"
